===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[true]]; [[accurate]]; [[verifiable]]
# {{senseid|zh|truly}} [[truly]]; [[indeed]]
# [[trustworthy]]
# to [[believe]]; to [[trust]] in something
#: {{zh-x|我 才 不 信 呢。|I don't believe it/you.}}
#* {{zh-x|這 人 來，為 要 作 見證，叫 眾人 因 他 可以 信。|The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might '''believe'''.|ref=[http://wordproject.org/multi/bi_en_cn_py.htm John 1.7]}}

#: {{zh-x|信任|trust}}
# to [[believe]] in (a faith); to be [[religious]] in
#: {{zh-x|我 父親 信 佛教。|My father is a [[Buddhist]]. (''lit.'' My father '''believes in''' Buddhism.)}}
# [[at will]]
#: {{zh-x|信口.雌黃|to make irresponsible remarks (''lit.'' to correct someone with '''at will''')}}
# [[letter]] {{gloss|written communication}} {{zh-mw|m,c:封}}
# [[message]]; [[news]]; [[information]]
#: {{zh-x|信息|news, message}}
# [[evidence]]
#: {{zh-x|信物|token, keepsake}}
